Key Features

Discover the innovative features that make our educational platform unique

Course Management

Complete system for creating, managing and delivering art courses with advanced tools for students and teachers.

Blockchain Integration

Native integration with Polygon for secure transactions, wallet management and smart contracts for certifications.

🔧 Tech Stack

Cutting-Edge Technologies

Our platform is built using the most modern and secure technologies

  • Frontend: React.js, Bootstrap 5, Modern UI/UX
  • Backend: Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL
  • Blockchain: Polygon Network, Web3.js, MetaMask
  • Security: JWT Authentication, Encrypted Wallets
